languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, астропаты рапортуют о полученном сообщении. В нем говорится, что Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар передает свой привет Вашей Светлости и надеется на как можно более скорую встречу в его дворце на Футфоле".

"Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, астропаты рапортуют о полученном сообщении. В нем говорится, что Лорд-инквизитор Калькасар передает свой привет Вашей Светлости и надеется на как можно более скорую встречу в его дворце на Футфоле".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the astropath are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at the earliest convenience."

"Lord Captain, the astropath are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at the earliest convenience."

"Lord Captain, the astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at Your earliest convenience."

"Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

"Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at Your earliest convenience."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos astropathes viennent de recevoir un message du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. Il vous adresse ses respects et espère pouvoir s'entretenir avec vous dans son palais de Castel dans les plus brefs délais, si vous le voulez bien. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos astropathes viennent de recevoir un message du seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar. Il vous adresse ses respects et espère pouvoir s'entretenir avec vous dans son palais de Castel dans les plus brefs délais, si vous le voulez bien. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，星语者发来了一条新消息，说卡尔卡扎尔大审判官向您致意，希望您在方便的时候能尽快前往落脚港的宫殿，与他进行会面。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，星语者发来了一条新消息，说卡尔卡扎尔审判长向您致意，希望您在方便的时候能尽快前往落脚港的宫殿，与他进行会面。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die Astropathen melden eine neue Nachricht. Großinquisitor Calcazar sendet Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} seine Grüße und hofft, Euch in seinem Palast auf Footfall begrüßen zu dürfen, sobald es Euch genehm ist."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die Astropathen melden eine neue Nachricht. Großinquisitor Calcazar sendet Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} seine Grüße und hofft, Euch in seinem Palast auf Footfall begrüßen zu dürfen, sobald es Euch genehm ist."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los Astrópatas avisan de un nuevo mensaje. Dice que el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar le envía saludos y quiere reunirse con usted en su palacio de Paso cuando mejor le convenga».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los Astrópatas avisan de un nuevo mensaje. Dice que el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar le envía saludos y quiere reunirse con usted en su palacio de Paso cuando mejor le convenga».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信官から新たなメッセージの報告がありました。ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルが陛下に敬意を表して、ご都合が付き次第早急に、フットフォールにある彼の宮殿でお会いしたいとのご意向です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、感応通信官から新たなメッセージの報告がありました。ロード・インクィジターのカルカサルが陛下に敬意を表して、ご都合が付き次第早急に、フットフォールにある彼の宮殿でお会いしたいとのご意向です」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, Astropatlardan yeni bir ileti geldi. Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne saygılarını sunuyor ve bir an evvel Binliman'daki sarayında uygun bir vakitte görüşmeyi umuyormuş."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the Astropaths are reporting a new message. It says Lord Inquisitor Calcazar is sending his regards to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} and is hoping to meet you in his palace at Footfall at your earliest convenience."
